thread.title: Australia's Steve Smith 'deeply regrets' ball tampering

title: Australia's Steve Smith 'deeply regrets' ball tampering
text:
Australia's Steve Smith 'deeply regrets' ball tampering 10:24am BST - 01:06 
Australia's cricket captain Steve Smith says he's 'not proud at what's happened' for his part in a ball-tampering incident during the third test against South Africa ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
